Donate to the Clara Lionel Foundation

Donate

Fenty Beauty, LLC collects donations on behalf of The Clara Lionel Foundation, a 501(c)3 tax-exempt organization. 100% of your donation will go to CLF. Donation is non-refundable and tax-deductible. Donations will be remitted to the charity within 30 days of the end of the month in which the donation was made. Donations may not be made to charity in the event it is not in good standing with the IRS, Franchise Tax Board, and/or the state of California. Donations are not eligible for discount and are excluded from promotions. For questions, contact customerservice@fentybeauty.com Learn More
